channel.title: [PI] Client Runtime Error *UPDATED*
channel.description:
[code]Ev°IllusionsÖ is loading.. This could take a minute just sit back and relax. Loaded 525 graphics... Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 2 sendPacket185(3987) Error: T2 - 44,65,81 - 5,3080,9497 - -114,122,0,88,12, Error: T1 - 96,0 - 187,219 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 156 at client.drawRedStones(client.java:2869) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2963) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9671) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10513) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6053) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code] Could somebody tell me what's wrong? This is what happens when I try to smith a bar together. And now I get this too: [code]Ev°IllusionsÖ is loading.. This could take a minute just sit back and relax. Loaded 525 graphics... Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 sendPacket185(3987) Error: T2 - 44,65,81 - 5,3078,9497 - -71,106,0,88,12, Error: T1 - 90,0 - 208,176 Error: T1 - 77,0 - 90,208 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -12543 at client.method119(client.java:10845) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:10574) at client.method146(client.java:14518) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9673) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10513) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6053) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
AND NOW I GET THIS ON STARTUP: [code]Ev°IllusionsÖ is loading.. This could take a minute just sit back and relax. Loaded 525 graphics... Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8482 at RSFont.method389(RSFont.java:173) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10084) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2970) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9671) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10513) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6053) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: [PI] Client Runtime Error *UPDATED*
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

I’m sorry guys I think I led you to believe that this was a Source problem?
This is in my Client’s RunTime;

Ev°IllusionsÖ is loading.. This could take a minute just sit back and relax. Loaded 525 graphics... Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8482 at RSFont.getTextWidth(RSFont.java:90) at RSFont.method382(RSFont.java:75) at client.drawLoginScreen(client.java:11669) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10511) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6053) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

OKAY and now I fixed that, but now I am getting this;

Ev°IllusionsÖ is loading.. This could take a minute just sit back and relax. Loaded 525 graphics... Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 5 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8482 at RSFont.method389(RSFont.java:173) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10084) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2970) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9671) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10513) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6053) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Client Runtime Error *UPDATED*
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:463677”][quote author=ohokay link=topic=567280.msg4122108#msg4122108 date=1349857724]
It’s something to do with

with the login method in the client class

Possibly the text in your case? I had this same error yesterday and I was messing around with k = socketStream.read();
[/quote]
ehhh, no.

The answer to your problem lies in the error.

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8482

Something is trying to access an array with an index of “8482”, but the array just isn’t that big, so either, the method that is trying to access this array is wrong, or you need to increase the size of the array[/quote]

And the array that is trying to be accessed could be in the login method right? (the following lines of the error) It crashes as soon as the player logs in and I got the same error yesterday whilst changing stuff in there. Was just trying to give a pointer of where it could be.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Client Runtime Error *UPDATED*
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:463677”]It’s something to do with

with the login method in the client class

Possibly the text in your case? I had this same error yesterday and I was messing around with k = socketStream.read();[/quote]
ehhh, no.

The answer to your problem lies in the error.

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8482

Something is trying to access an array with an index of “8482”, but the array just isn’t that big, so either, the method that is trying to access this array is wrong, or you need to increase the size of the array

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Client Runtime Error *UPDATED*
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

[code]Ev°IllusionsÖ is loading…
This could take a minute just sit back and relax.
Loaded 525 graphics…
Loading animations
Loaded the flo.
602 NPC Amount: 11257
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
2
sendPacket185(3987)
Error: T2 - 44,65,81 - 5,3080,9497 - -114,122,0,88,12,
Error: T1 - 96,0 - 187,219
Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 156
at client.drawRedStones(client.java:2869)
at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2963)
at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9671)
at client.processDrawing(client.java:10513)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)

[/code]
Could somebody tell me what’s wrong? This is what happens when I try to smith a bar together.
And now I get this too:

Ev°IllusionsÖ is loading.. This could take a minute just sit back and relax. Loaded 525 graphics... Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 sendPacket185(3987) Error: T2 - 44,65,81 - 5,3078,9497 - -71,106,0,88,12, Error: T1 - 90,0 - 208,176 Error: T1 - 77,0 - 90,208 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -12543 at client.method119(client.java:10845) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:10574) at client.method146(client.java:14518) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9673) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10513) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6053) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

AND NOW I GET THIS ON STARTUP:

Ev°IllusionsÖ is loading.. This could take a minute just sit back and relax. Loaded 525 graphics... Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8482 at RSFont.method389(RSFont.java:173) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10084) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2970) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9671) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10513) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6053) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
